title: Natural + Vegan Crystal Infused DELUXE Wellness Box | Self-Care for Body + Mind + Spirit
description: Self-care Bath + Body products Curated for the current season, so you can always be in alignment with the energies of nature. This box will help you connect with your highest self!
cleaned_text: All Natural + Vegan Crystal Infused wellness boxes to help you on your journey to empowered self-care rituals for Body + Skin + Spirit. The Deluxe Box includes: Body Wash Body Butter or Lotion Bath Soak Natural Perfume or Body Mist Meditation Body Oil Palo Santo Stick Healing stone Bath Accessory Meditation Guide + Playlist QUARTERLY SEASONAL WELLNESS BOX- Each Quarterly Seasonal box is crafted with a beautiful cache of products that reflect the changing seasons, to help you on your journey to empowered self-care rituals for body + skin + spirit throughout the year. 5+ HEALING CRYSTAL INFUSED PRODUCTS IN EVERY BOX - Each Wellness box is carefully curated with Natural Self Care products such as Body Butter, Meditation - Body Oil, Body Wash, Artisan soap, Bath Salts, Shower Steamers, Body Scrub, Massage Candle & Bath Accessories SELF CARE FOR BODY, MIND + SPRIT- Each quarter you will receive a box featuring a different crystal healing stone. All products are focused on the current season and the stones intentions and energy to produce products that deliver positive effects for the body, mind spirit. NATURAL, VEGAN, CRUELTY-FREE - Handmade in the USA in small batches, we combine the energy of Organic Ingredients & Crystals to produce Superior All Natural Products. Our products DO NOT contain synthetic ingredients, SLS, parabens, sulfates, phthalates. A WONDERFUL GIFT BOX FOR ANYONE - Beautifully packaged, superior products! Treat yourself or a Loved one to this Wellness Self Care Box - Over $140 Value in each box - Using Only the Highest Quality Natural Ingredients Customer Questions (0) Have a question?
